sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO md_derivatives ( id , src_id , src_type , derived_id , derived_type , derived_connection_id_fk , transformed , original_identifier , new_identifier , derived_object_namespace , derivative_reason , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by ) VALUES ( #id# , #srcId# , #srcType# , #derivedId# , #derivedType# , #derivedConnectionIdFk# , #transformed# , #originalIdentifier# , #newIdentifier# , #derivedObjectNamespace# , #derivativeReason# , #securityGroupId# , #createdOn# , #createdBy# , #lastUpdatedOn# , #lastUpdatedBy# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE md_derivatives SET id = #id# , src_id = #srcId# , src_type = #srcType# , derived_id = #derivedId# , derived_type = #derivedType# , derived_connection_id_fk = #derivedConnectionIdFk# , transformed = #transformed# , original_identifier = #originalIdentifier# , new_identifier = #newIdentifier# , derived_object_namespace = #derivedObjectNamespace# , derivative_reason = #derivativeReason# , security_group_id = #securityGroupId# , created_on = #createdOn# , created_by = #createdBy# , last_updated_on = #lastUpdatedOn# , last_updated_by = #lastUpdatedBy# WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM md_derivatives WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT id , src_id , src_type , derived_id , derived_type , derived_connection_id_fk , transformed , original_identifier , new_identifier , derived_object_namespace , derivative_reason , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by FROM MD_DERIVATIVES WHERE id = #id#

SELECT A.ID , A.SRC_ID , A.SRC_TYPE , A.DERIVED_ID , A.DERIVED_TYPE , A.DERIVED_CONNECTION_ID_FK , A.TRANSFORMED , A.ORIGINAL_IDENTIFIER , A.NEW_IDENTIFIER , A.DERIVED_OBJECT_NAMESPACE , A.DERIVATIVE_REASON , A.SECURITY_GROUP_ID , A.CREATED_ON , A.CREATED_BY , A.LAST_UPDATED_ON , A.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM ( SELECT ID , SRC_ID , SRC_TYPE , DERIVED_ID , DERIVED_TYPE , DERIVED_CONNECTION_ID_FK , TRANSFORMED , ORIGINAL_IDENTIFIER , NEW_IDENTIFIER , DERIVED_OBJECT_NAMESPACE , DERIVATIVE_REASON , SECURITY_GROUP_ID , CREATED_ON , CREATED_BY , LAST_UPDATED_ON , LAST_UPDATED_BY , ROWNUM FROM MD_DERIVATIVES WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
SRC_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM MD_DERIVATIVES WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
SRC_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
